casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Douglas Wayne STANALAND 333P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 5, 2018 Douglas Wayne Stanaland, Robert S. Banks, District Attorney, for Stanaland, Douglas Wayne. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of October 2018 by Defendant to Take Judicial Notice:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2018."
